document_data.name: Sewers of Elturel
document_data.mainbody: The '''sewers of Elturel''' were a sanitation system of brick tunnels beneath the city of [[Elturel]].

Structure.Surface Connections: * The [[Dwarf's Pot Inn]] had a hidden entrance to the sewers in its cellar. This had been constructed by the inn's owner, [[Algaroz]], and his friend [[Pinch]]. On the sewer side of things, this entrance was marked by a jagged gap in the brick casing of a sewer wall. Fortunately the air  within the inn was typically so thick with the smells of wood smoke, stale [[ale]], and spiced stew that the odor of the sewers was rarely ever noticed.<ref>

document_data.History:
During his years as a [[thief]] on the streets of Elturel, Pinch and his gang of rogues frequently navigated the city through use of the sewers, with his companion [[Sprite-Heels]] having memorized many of the twisting tunnels to the best of his abilities.

Early 15{{th}} century [[DR]], Elturel was among the cities whose sewers were significantly expanded and improved upon by the [[gnome]] [[Joster Barbellow]].{{Cite web/Forging the Realms/Lord of the Sewers}}
